docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: About Us ## Lab Overview The Torche Lab was established in [year] with a mission to [mission statement]. ## Our Mission We strive to: - Advance scientific understanding of [topic] - Train the next generation of researchers - Translate research into policy impact - Foster interdisciplinary collaboration ## Lab Culture Our lab values: - Collaboration - We work together and support each other - Rigor - We maintain high scientific standards - Inclusion - We welcome diverse perspectives - Impact - We aim to make a difference ## Facilities Our lab is equipped with: - High-performance computing cluster - GIS workstations - Collaborative workspace - Meeting and presentation areas

Contact ## Location Torche Lab [Department Name] [Institution] [Building], Room [Number] [City, State ZIP] ## Get in Touch Principal Investigator: Dr. [Name] Email: [email] Office: [location] Lab Manager: [Name] Email: [email] ## Prospective Students We're always interested in hearing from motivated students. If you're interested in joining the lab: 1. Review our research areas 2. Read some of our recent publications 3. Email Dr. [Name] with: - Your CV - Research interests - Why you want to join our lab ## Visiting [Add map or directions if relevant]

People ## Principal Investigator ### Dr. [Name] Associate Professor Bio and research interests... - Email: [email] - Office: [location] - Personal website --- ## Graduate Students ### [Your Name] PhD/MS Student Research focus: [area] - Email: [email] - LinkedIn ### [Student Name 2] PhD Student Research focus: [area] --- ## Undergraduate Researchers - [Name] - [Project] - [Name] - [Project] --- ## Alumni ### Former Graduate Students - [Name] (PhD 2024) - Now at [Institution] - [Name] (MS 2023) - Now at [Company]

Publications ## 2025 1. Author, A., Author, B., & [PI Name]. (2025). Title of paper. Journal Name, 10(2), 123-145. DOI | PDF 2. [PI Name] & Author, C. (2025). Another paper title. Journal Name, 15(3), 200-220. ## 2024 1. Author, D., [PI Name], et al. (2024). Paper title. Conference Proceedings, 45-60. --- ## In Press / Under Review - Author, E. & [PI Name]. (under review). Manuscript title. Journal. --- ## Google Scholar For a complete list, see our Google Scholar profile.

Research ## Current Projects ### Project 1: [Title] Funded by: [Funding Agency] Duration: [Years] Description of the project... Team: [Names] --- ### Project 2: [Title] Funded by: [Funding Agency] Duration: [Years] Description of the project... --- ## Research Themes ### Theme 1: [Topic] Overview of this research area... ### Theme 2: [Topic] Overview of this research area... ## Collaborations We collaborate with researchers at: - [Institution 1] - [Institution 2] - [Organization]
